required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I/IIa Clinical Research of TJ011133 in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia (r/r AML)
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open, Single-arm, Phase I/IIa Clinical Research to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerance, Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics and Preliminary Efficacy of TJ011133 in the Treatment of Patients With Relapsed or Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia (r/r AML)

brief_summary.textblock: A multi-center, open, single-arm, Phase I/IIa clinical research to evaluate the safety, tolerance, pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics and preliminary efficacy of TJ011133 in the treatment of patients with relapsed or refractory acute myeloid leukemia (r/r AML)

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerance of TJ011133 monotherapy in patients with r/r AML

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: To explore the maximum tolerable dose (MTD) of TJ011133 monotherapy for patients with r/r AML, the recommended phase II dose (RP2D) and the optimal dosage regimen.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year

arm_group.description: TJ011133 is tentatively administered once a week for a treatment cycle every 28 days

intervention.description: TJ011133 is tentatively administered once a week for a treatment cycle every 28 days

facility.name: Institute of Hematology and Blood Disease Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences & Peking Union Medical College
